word:
Open-air meetings are quite common in England. If conducted on right principles, these are good. Jesus placed Himself in the great thoroughfares of travel, where His voice was heard by thousands. The precious words that fell from His lips found a lodgment in many hearts and caused them to search and see if these things were so.--Ms 18, 1885. 



Ellen G. White Estate 
Silver Spring, Maryland 
April 18, 1991. Entire Ms.
